id: realclearpolitics--2019-05-15--At Harvard Youre Guilty Until Proven Innocent
title: At Harvard, You're Guilty Until Proven Innocent
content: Lawyers need not defend their clients because the guilty, in this brave new worldview, do not deserve representation. That's the logic at Harvard
author: <a href="/authors/daniella_davis">Daniella Davis</a>, Spectator USA
